name: search_places
description: Search for places, restaurants, shops, or any location based on a text query. Use this when the user asks to find places, restaurants, cafes, hotels, or any business.

query.description: The search query (e.g., 'coffee shops', 'italian restaurants', 'hotels in Paris')

location.description: Optional location to search near (e.g., 'New York', '40.7128,-74.0060')
